items.text: back of a length, cut to backward point
down and across to a back of a length ball and scoops it over the keeper
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: short, cuts in off the deck, pulled to short fine leg
full toss, flicked behind square
full, sprayed down leg
short of good length, angled into him, swivels and pulls over backward square leg
items.shortText: Joseph to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: dipping full toss that angles in and hits the pad. Alzarri belts out an appeal but well down the leg side
items.shortText: Joseph to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 leg bye

items.text: flicks a full toss through square leg
back of a length outside off, backs away and taps to short third man
items.shortText: Joseph to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full, driven to long-off
keeps low as it sneaks under the bat with Mushfiqur looking to pull from outside off
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: appeal for leg before, given. Mushfiqur reviews. Flat length ball, Mushfiqur looks to reverse sweep this as it turns away from a middle and leg line. Clear inside edge caught on Ultra Edge
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short, spinning away, cut to sweeper cover
backs away to a fuller one and thumps it down the ground. Hammered very hard
short, spinning away, cut to sweeper cover
full on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
low full toss on middle, flicked to square leg
clean strike. Full on the pads, stays leg side of it and clips it over deep midwicket. Sweetly-timed
items.shortText: Joseph to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

items.text: full on the stumps, driven down the ground for one
length on off, flicked to deep midwicket
length ball outside off, opens the face to short third man

items.preText: Abdullah: "Imagine wasting your only review so early in the game like WI, and then getting 3 wrong calls against you with no review available. Thankfully, BD was not in that situation which saved them from losing 3 more wickets."
items.text: spins away from a back of a length, nudged into the off side
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: gets down for a sweep and gets a top-edge to deep midwicket
advances down the ground and crunches a drive to sweeper cover

items.preText: Jishnu Banerjee: "Mushfiq could take at least two, if not 4, in that review delivery. It didn't count just because Umpire gave a wrong LBW decision! How funny! ICC should take a look to this rule. "
items.text: short, spins away, cut to sweeper cover
